DOC.brief_title: The Effect Web-Based Behavioral Intervention Physical Activity Levels Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Physical activity associate variety positive health outcome , well improve metabolic profile reduce inflammation . However , level moderate vigorous physical activity ( MVPA ) diminish dramatically child move middle school year . To address problem , study test behavioral intervention , call `` Zamzee , '' design motivate middle school-aged child increase level MVPA . The Zamzee intervention consist 3-axis accelerometer track individual physical activity rate time website display individual physical activity rate provide reward maintain improve physical activity rate . The primary aim randomize , control trial test whether middle school-aged child randomly assign Zamzee intervention show significantly great level physical activity level six month , compare control group participant wear accelerometer access reward website . A secondary aim test intervention 's impact biological parameter may contribute long-term health effect inactivity ( include C-reactive protein measure inflammation , hemoglobin-A1C measure metabolic status ) sub-set study participant agree provide blood sample .
